description: UserInfo holds the information about the user needed to implement the user.Info interface.

extra.description: extra is any additional information provided by the authenticator.

groups.description: groups is the names of groups this user is a part of.

uid.description: uid is a unique value that identifies this user across time. If this user is deleted and another user by the same name is added, they will have different UIDs.

username.description: username is the name that uniquely identifies this user among all active users.
